85551.<speed=0><color_yellow>釣りバトルの遊び方の説明です！\n:
This is will explain Fishing Battles!
Reel in your fishing rod before your Line HP runs out to pull the fish ashore!
You can only use fishing skills a certain number of times per battle, such as loosening your line or reeling in hard.
Use these skills at the opportune moments to successfully catch the fish!

86193.さかなが かかった！ これは 大物だ！: Hooked a fish! It's a big one!

87474.最大サイズ更新！: That's a new largest size record!

88135.<speed=0>この釣り場のさかなは 手強そうだ。\nここで 釣りを始めますか:
